title: Define complete Model struct with all state fields
description:
Expand Model struct with all required state fields:

Epic/Run state:
- epicID, epicTitle string
- iteration int
- taskID, taskTitle string (current task)
- running, paused, quitting bool
- startTime time.Time

Budget tracking:
- cost, maxCost float64
- tokens int
- maxIterations int

UI state:
- focusedPane FocusedPane (enum: PaneStatus, PaneTasks, PaneOutput)
- showHelp, showComplete bool
- completeReason, completeSignal string

Components:
- viewport viewport.Model (for output pane)
- tasks []TaskInfo (task list data)
- selectedTask int (selected index)
- output string (agent output buffer)

Layout:
- width, height int
- ready bool
- animFrame int (for pulsing animations)

Communication:
- pauseChan chan<- bool

Define FocusedPane enum type with constants.
closed_reason: Added FocusedPane enum (PaneStatus, PaneTasks, PaneOutput), TaskStatus/TaskInfo types, and expanded Model struct with all required state fields: epic/run state (epicID, epicTitle, iteration, taskID, taskTitle, running, paused, quitting, startTime), budget tracking (cost, maxCost, tokens, maxIterations), UI state (focusedPane, showHelp, showComplete, completeReason, completeSignal), components (viewport, tasks, selectedTask, output), layout (width, height, ready, animFrame), and communication (pauseChan). tui package compiles independently.
